channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on nravic

item.description: x— title: “Solving Non-Planar Two Link Systems” date: 2018-10-09T03:24:27+04:00 draft: false One of the things I’m working on at the ADAMS lab at SUNY Buffalo is designing a miniature insect-inspired hexapod from the ground up, developing a controls architecture using neuroevolution algorithms written in-house to actually building it (eventually) with smart material actuators. Approaching the problem head on with a dynamic analysis fails, because the joints of the leg in my system are coupled.
